item.title: Kick-ass Agile Team
item.author: ivan@iky.li (Ivan Li)
item.description: Team startup has been on the fore-front of my mind lately because we’re just about to go through a re-structure. Sitting over a coffee, I took some time to think about what sort of team I really want to be part of and create. It really wasn’t a difficult choice: a world-class team that could tackle any challenges thrown their way. A team like this would be a well-oiled learning and discovery machine.
